definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The genesis of aragonite is also discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 並探討了文石的形成機制。

sentences.english: Pan soon found himself in disagreement with some of his scientific colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 潘文石很快發現自己與他的一些科研同行產生了分歧。

sentences.english: In the shell, mineral form of calcium carbonate is calcite and aragonite.
sentences.chinese: 貝殼中的碳酸鈣是以文石和方解石形式存在。

sentences.english: Pan's work with pandas is rooted in his boyhood dreams.
sentences.chinese: 潘文石對熊貓的熱愛源於他少年時的夢想。

sentences.english: Pan missed his wife and two small daughters terribly.
sentences.chinese: 潘文石非常思念自己的妻子和兩個年幼的女兒。

sentences.english: Its characteristic reflected in Jing Wenshi PetName "Kam-grain stone" in the meaning of.
sentences.chinese: 其特徵體現在景文石的乳名“錦紋石”的含義之中。

sentences.english: During the night, Pan heard slow footsteps and breathing noises outside his room.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，潘文石聽到屋外傳來緩慢的腳步聲和呼吸聲。

sentences.english: Pan and his team examined the infant.
sentences.chinese: 潘文石和小組成員給幼崽做了體檢。

sentences.english: Artistic features of Jing Wenshi is "Kam-grain".
sentences.chinese: 故景文石的藝術特色就是“錦紋”。

sentences.english: Squeezing towards the cave, his arm outstretched, Pan inches closer to Jiao Jiao.
sentences.chinese: 潘文石擠向洞穴，伸出手臂，緩慢地向姣姣靠近。

sentences.english: Pan has discovered; a mutual accommodation between farmers and pandas.
sentences.chinese: 潘文石還發現大熊貓和農民之間能夠和平共處。

definition: stone beam/horizontal slab of stone/feldspar or felspar (geology)
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
phanerocrystalline/with crystal structure visible to the naked eye
